records.location_details: A boat carrying a number of people was first sighted by a Frontex participating unit in Turkish territorial waters in the Eastern Aegean. The Turkish authorities were promptly informed and the Hellenic Coast Guard authorities took appropriate measures to address the illegal border crossing.
records.where_clear: Turkish territorial waters in the Eastern Aegean Sea
records.location_text_raw: Turkish territorial waters in Eastern Aegean
records.country_or_area: Turkish territorial waters, Eastern Aegean Sea
records.geocodable_query: Turkish territorial waters, Eastern Aegean Sea
records.context_note: The situation involved a boat carrying a number of people, sighted by Frontex in Turkish territorial waters. Greek and Turkish authorities coordinated efficiently, taking measures to address the illegal border crossing and ensure safety, in compliance with international law. Efforts for prevention of unauthorized border crossings were intensified due to COVID-19 risks.
records.evidence_quote: These circumstances involved a boat carrying a number of people which was first sighted by a Frontex participating unit in Turkish territorial waters.
